mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, title, views, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_at, is_urgent FROM RECALL_NOTICE_DB ORDER BY is_urgent DESC, notice_id DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET ${(pageNum - 1) * amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECALL_NOTICE_DB (title, content, is_urgent) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, IFNULL(#{is_urgent, jdbcType=CHAR}, 'N'))
mapper.update: UPDATE RECALL_NOTICE_DB SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_urgent = #{is_urgent}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, title, content, views, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_at, is_urgent FROM RECALL_NOTICE_DB WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY notice_id DESC
